In collab. with Mecca 2017 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements.
Genre: Educational, Puzzle.
Description: Game designed to reinforce auditive language development on kids, it is packed with voice recordings in several languages. The language is selected randomly each time you replay the game. The main mechanics consist in dragging the roulette and make it spin and then complete a jigsaw puzzle of the selected vehicle.
Developed with: Unity/C#, Android plugin/Java.
Target platform: Mobile devices/Android.
My contributions: Programming of mechanics and connection to an external service (game platform) through an Android plugin.
title: Code name: Vehicles

content:
2017 - 2019 Play on simmer.io
Genre: Tank shooter, 2D top-down view, death-match mode.
Description: Multiplayer game supporting up to 20 concurrent users (CCU). It includes AI-driven tanks (gray color) to compensate for the absence of players. The map was built using layered tiles. Other features are:
Basic personalization (player name and tank color). Pickups (healing, shield, laser and speed boost). Mini-map. Leaderboard. Developed with: Unity/C#, Photon PUN 2 (multiplayer plugin).
Target platform: Web browser on PC.
title: Tank Blast Arena 2D

content:
In collab. with Mecca 2017 - 2019 Genre: Puzzle.
Description: It is set in a laboratory where a gelatinous alien, called Sticky, is being detained, he splits into two playable characters as they try to escape using the pipelines. You control one of the characters while the other one will follow your movements but inverted to the sides, i.e. you move left and the other will go right, and viceversa.
Developed with: Unity/C#.
Target platform: Mobile devices/Android.
My contributions: Programming and testing of new mechanics involving new interactive items. Development of a level generator and editor.
title: Sticky Flee
